Submodules¶

src.webapp module¶

Main code to execute flask and the logging system

src.webapp.setup_logging()¶

Configure logging for the application.

Sets up a console handler for INFO-level logs and a file handler for WARNING and above. Prevents duplicate handlers if logging is already configured. Adjusts the Werkzeug logger to match the desired log level without adding extra handlers.

Logs:

  • Console: INFO and above

  • File (app.log): WARNING and above
